alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Northeast Blue Mountains; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 6:09PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Adams, Garfield, central Whitman and northwestern Asotin Counties through 645 PM PDT... At 604 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lind to La Crosse to Dusty to Mayview. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects, and cause localized near zero visibility due to blowing dust. Lightning may also ignite wildfires. Locations impacted include... Ritzville, Pomeroy, Lind, Endicott, Washtucna, Riparia, Hay, Dodge, Revere, La Crosse, Mayview, Dusty, Wawawai, and Rock Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Lightning may ignite wildfires. Please report any new fires to 911 immediately!

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Northeast Blue Mountains; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse
